Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.server.master
    The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.api
    API interfaces for the main service classes.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.notification.atom
    This package contains the Atom feed implementation within Taverna Server.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest
    This package contains the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest.handler
    This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest used by org.apache.taverna.server.master 
    Class and Description
    InteractionFeedREST
    A very stripped down ATOM feed for the interaction service.
    TavernaServerREST
    The REST service interface to Taverna 3 Server.
    TavernaServerREST.PolicyView
    How to discover the publicly-visible policies supported by this server.
    TavernaServerREST.RunList
    Helper class for describing the workflow runs.
    TavernaServerREST.ServerDescription
    Helper class for describing the server's user-facing management API via JAXB.
    TavernaServerRunREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run looks to a RESTful API.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.api 
    Class and Description
    TavernaServerDirectoryREST
    Representation of how a workflow run's working directory tree looks.
    TavernaServerInputREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run's inputs looks to a RESTful API.
    TavernaServerListenersREST
    This represents all the event listeners attached to a workflow run.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.Property
    This represents a single property attached of an event listener.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.TavernaServerListenerREST
    This represents a single event listener attached to a workflow run.
    TavernaServerREST
    The REST service interface to Taverna 3 Server.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST
    Manages the security of the workflow run.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.notification.atom 
    Class and Description
    TavernaServerREST.EventFeed
    The interface exposed by the Atom feed of events.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest 
    Class and Description
    DirectoryContents
    The result of a RESTful operation to list the contents of a directory.
    InteractionFeedREST
    A very stripped down ATOM feed for the interaction service.
    ListenerDefinition
    Description of what sort of event listener to create and attach to a workflow run.
    MakeOrUpdateDirEntry
    The input to the REST interface for making directories and files, and uploading file contents.
    TavernaServerDirectoryREST
    Representation of how a workflow run's working directory tree looks.
    TavernaServerDirectoryREST.NegotiationFailedException
    Exception thrown to indicate a failure by the client to provide an acceptable content type.
    TavernaServerInputREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run's inputs looks to a RESTful API.
    TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc
    The Details of a particular input port's value assignment, done with JAXB.
    TavernaServerInputREST.InDesc.AbstractContents
    Either a filename or a literal string, used to provide input to a workflow port.
    TavernaServerInputREST.InputsDescriptor
    A description of the structure of inputs to a Taverna workflow run, done with JAXB.
    TavernaServerListenersREST
    This represents all the event listeners attached to a workflow run.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.ListenerDescription
    A description of an event listener that is attached to a workflow run.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.Listeners
    The list of descriptions of listeners attached to a run.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.Properties
    The list of properties of a listener.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.Property
    This represents a single property attached of an event listener.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.PropertyDescription
    The description of a single property, done with JAXB.
    TavernaServerListenersREST.TavernaServerListenerREST
    This represents a single event listener attached to a workflow run.
    TavernaServerREST.EnabledNotificationFabrics
    Helper class for describing the listener types that are allowed via JAXB.
    TavernaServerREST.PermittedListeners
    Helper class for describing the listener types that are allowed via JAXB.
    TavernaServerREST.PermittedWorkflows
    Helper class for describing the workflows that are allowed via JAXB.
    TavernaServerREST.PolicyView
    How to discover the publicly-visible policies supported by this server.
    TavernaServerREST.PolicyView.CapabilityList
    A list of Taverna Server capabilities.
    TavernaServerREST.PolicyView.PolicyDescription
    A description of the parts of a server policy.
    TavernaServerREST.RunList
    Helper class for describing the workflow runs.
    TavernaServerREST.ServerDescription
    Helper class for describing the server's user-facing management API via JAXB.
    TavernaServerRunREST
    This represents how a Taverna Server workflow run looks to a RESTful API.
    TavernaServerRunREST.RunDescription
    The description of where everything is in a RESTful view of a workflow run.
    TavernaServerRunREST.RunDescription.Expiry
    How to describe a run's expiry.
    TavernaServerRunREST.RunDescription.ListenerList
    The description of a list of listeners attached to a run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST
    Manages the security of the workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialHolder
    A container for a credential, used to work around issues with type inference in CXF's REST service handling and JAXB.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.CredentialList
    A simple list of credential descriptions.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.Descriptor
    A description of the security resources associated with a workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.Descriptor.Credentials
    A description of credentials associated with a workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.Descriptor.Trusts
    A description of trusted certificates associated with a workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionDescription
    An instruction to update the permissions for a user.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionsDescription
    A description of the permissions granted to others by the owner of a workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.PermissionsDescription.LinkedPermissionDescription
    A description of the permissions granted to one user by the owner of a workflow run.
    TavernaServerSecurityREST.TrustList
    A simple list of trusted certificate descriptions.

    Class and Description
    FileSegment
    Representation of a segment of a file to be read by JAX-RS.
    TavernaServerDirectoryREST.NegotiationFailedException
    Exception thrown to indicate a failure by the client to provide an acceptable content type.
